import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const services = [ { name: 'Website Design', href: '/web-design' }, { name: 'Local SEO', href: '/local-seo' }, { name: 'Google Business Profile', href: '/google-business-profile' }, { name: 'Free SEO Audit', href: '/#contact' }, ]; const areas = [ 'Bath', 'Keynsham', 'Midsomer Norton', 'Radstock', 'Peasedown St John', 'Paulton', 'Saltford', 'Timsbury', ]; const company = [ { name: 'About Us', href: '/about', isRoute: true }, { name: 'Case Studies', href: '/#results' }, { name: 'Blog', href: '#blog' }, { name: 'Contact', href: '/#contact' }, ]; return (
{/* Main Footer */}
{/* Brand Column */}
S
SEOKings

Helping tradespeople and local businesses in Bath & North East Somerset get found on Google and grow their customer base.

{/* Contact Info */}
01225 123 456 hello@seokings.co.uk
{/* Services Column */}

Services

    {services.map((service, index) => (
  • {service.name}
    • ))}
{/* Areas Column */}

Areas We Serve

    {areas.map((area, index) => (
  • {area}
    • ))}
{/* Company Column */}

Company

    {company.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.isRoute ? ( {item.name} ) : ( {item.name} )}
    • ))}
{/* Social Links */}

Follow Us

{/* Bottom Bar */}

Â© {currentYear} SEO Kings. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy Terms of Service
); }; export default Footer;
